name: Golden Ratio
description:
v1.0.0 (01/24/2022)

Learn how to construct and apply the golden ratio to your designs in Figma.

  • Step-by-step instructions
  • Learn how to create golden squares
  • Learn how to create golden circles
  • Learn how to create golden spiral


FigBlog

Go behind the scenes to see how Golden Ratio was made, including a few tricks and techniques to make logo designs with nice proportions.


Road Map

These are the planned releases. Vote for your favorite upcoming feature or suggest a new feature in the comments. Please include an @chsweb mention.



Planned

v1.1.0 - Automation of construction (requires Automator Plugin)
